title: Chicago White Sox revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 214.0 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 194.0 was reported at Year 2009
